Looking to upgrade and start my career again in .25. But in the shop I notice it saying x64 version is unstable and 32 bit should be used unless there is a specific need for x64

I have higher end computer so I am not worried about performance, but would like some clarification how unstable x64 version is. Or should I stick with the advice and download 32 bit.

Thanks in advance.

Edited October 19, 2014 by Bogusheadbox
